sentences.english: Art ceramic tiles add luster to the walls of your kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 藝術瓷磚，使您廚房四壁增輝。

sentences.english: Gani ceramics, let the ceramic glorifies life!
sentences.chinese: 簡一陶瓷，讓瓷磚讚美生活。

sentences.english: We export ceramic tiles in various designs and colors, and also make samples and designs from you.
sentences.chinese: 我司出口陶瓷磚，款式色彩豐富，也可來樣生產。

sentences.english: Mastic is the recommended adhesive for gluing indoor mosaic tiles.
sentences.chinese: 乳香是室內馬賽克瓷磚粘合膠建議。

sentences.english: Anna laid back in the bath and stared at the bathroom tiles.
sentences.chinese: 安娜躺進浴缸，盯着浴室的瓷磚。

sentences.english: These tiles cost $291 per square foot.
sentences.chinese: 這些瓷磚每平方英尺的價格爲291美元。

sentences.english: The ceramic tiles in the food preparation areas have also been vitrified for extra strength.
sentences.chinese: 竈臺用瓷磚構造成玻璃狀增機了額外的力量。

sentences.english: Tile cutter, hand riveter, mitre saw and related products.
sentences.chinese: 瓷磚切割器，角鋸，拉鉚槍及相關產品。

sentences.english: We use tiles to cover roofs and sometimes floors and walls.
sentences.chinese: 我們用瓦片蓋房頂，有時也用瓷磚鋪地面和牆面。

sentences.english: Click on one of the tiles to start a chain reaction with tiles that are connected.
sentences.chinese: 關於瓷磚按一個開始與該連接瓷磚的連鎖反應。

sentences.english: Click on one of the tiles to start a chain reaction with tiles that are connected.
sentences.chinese: 關於瓷磚按一個開始與該連接瓷磚的連鎖反應。

sentences.english: No longer needs the ceramic tile 45 degrees cutting edges, saved man-hour and the breakage greatly.
sentences.chinese: 不再需要瓷磚45度切邊，大大節約了工時和破損。

sentences.english: Where has ceramic tile edge finishing machines sell?
Formulated to be non-aggressive on fine porcelain tile.
sentences.chinese: 處理劑的組成對漂亮瓷磚沒有腐蝕。

sentences.english: Tile in the main source of radon emitted by radium.
sentences.chinese: 瓷磚中所放射出來的氡主要來源鐳。

sentences.english: For one moment I just lay there staring at the ceiling tiles thinking I was dreaming.
sentences.chinese: 我躺在牀上看着屋頂上的瓷磚，以爲自己是在做夢。

definition: cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
